bad.alt: A Page from 'House Of Leaves'. This page is extremely difficult to navigate with backwards text and upsidedown text.
bad.description: This is a page from Mark Z Danielewski's House of Leaves. Users with vision impairments and users with screenreaders will find extremely difficult to navigate and read because of the way the text is organised.

good.alt: A screenshot of html code containing labels and alt tags for images
good.description: This html code uses alt tags for images and labels for buttons. These tags are made to be used with screenreaders allowing users with vision impairments to navigate and read the site.

hero.body: Health & Safety is an important implication to consider when creating your website. It's important to check to ensure that users are not going to be put in danger by your site.

bad.alt: Strobe Light Effects Flashing in the Users Face
bad.description: Unprompted Strobe Lights can negatively effect and harm users with epilepsy.

good.alt: A Flashing Light Warning, It Reads: 'WARNING, THE VIDEOS BELOW MAY CONTAIN BRIGHT FLASHING LIGHTS'
good.description: A warning gives users who may be affected a good indication of whats ahead. If they know they may be harmed they can click off to avoid it.

args.title: Legal & Interlectual Property
args.description: When making your site it's important to avoid any legal trouble by following these Implications.

hero.body: In web development, legal implications include ensuring that websites follow rules about privacy, like protecting users' personal data and complying with laws such as the GDPR. Additionally, developers must avoid copyright infringement by not using unauthorized content and respecting intellectual property rights.
hero.attribution: By Orginal: Chris Potter - Modifier: Ibrahim.ID - 3D Judges Gavel, CC BY 4.0,

bad.alt: A court Gavel with a sign in front reading: PROSECUTION
bad.description:
Encouraging or teaching users to commit crimes or break the law is a bad idea as you may be held responsible. 
Image from Pix4Free.org

good.alt: A warning stating that this page has been removed for harmful content.
good.description: Alowing yourself the ability to remove any malicious content will help avoid any legal trouble as it can quickly be taken down.

hero.body: Whenever a body of work or piece of art is created it is automatically protected by copyright laws. It is important to ensure that your site does not breach these laws or you may face great fines. This can often be done by giving attribution to the original authors.

bad.alt: A youtube warning that reads: Video Removed due to copyright.
bad.description: Often Using any Form of Copyrighted material can lead to ceace and desists and or large fines from the copyright owners.

good.alt: The creative commons logos and licences.
good.description: Using content released under creative commons licences offers a quick and clear way to use certain assets and videos with appropriate attribution. This will avoid any trouble with your website in the future.

hero.body: Will your website have a positive impact? Does it misrepresent any groups? Will it cause offense? Age, gender and Ethnicity are all important things to concider when making your website.
